department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Contract for Shower Sandals for Correctional Service Canada (CSC)
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking to award a contract for the purchase of shower sandals (Code CAG-2-0910-828C) for the Correctional Service Canada (CSC).
tags: department of Public Works and government services
full_summary:
### Announcement
#### Request for Proposal: Supply of Shower Sandals
#### Contract Number: WS4550570184

This tender announcement invites industry proponents to submit a proposal for the Supply of Shower Sandals. 

#### Contract Requirements

The Correctional Service of Canada is seeking a supplier for Shower Sandals that meets the specifications of Purchase Description CAG-2-0910-828C.
* Item 1: Firm Quantities - 21,240 pairs
* Item 2: Option to order additional quantities within 48 months from contract award - up to 80,000 pairs
* Item 3: "As and when requested" quantities within 48 months from contract award - up to 8,000 pairs
All deliverables must be delivered to Laval, Quebec.

#### Opportunities
* Competitive – Open Bidding
* Opportunity to participate in a trade agreement
* Specification: UNSPSC 53111800 - Sandals
* Description: This Request for Proposal is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

#### Tender Closing Dates and Further Information

Tender Closing Date: July 3, 2024 at 2:00 PM (EDT)
Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5 Canada
Contact Information
- Kritova, Darya (SPAC/PSPC)
- Email: darya.kritova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- Phone: Not available
- Pin: None

Please refer to the Discovery document at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/194896
